title: Veilfall
content:
=====
[[include component:preview
text=
Headlines from the birth of a new unveiled world. 
]]
=====

[[include theme:broken-masquerade]]

[[module CSS]]

div.tweet{
    color: black;
    float: center;
    border: solid 1px #000000;
    padding: 5px 15px 15px 15px;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);
    width: 84%;
    margin: 2% 4% 4% 4%
}

@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Cinzel');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Anton');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Pinyon+Script');

/*
    The Anton font was created by Vernon Adams and is licensed under the Open Font License
    The Cinzel font was created by Natanael Gama and is licensed under the Open Font License
    The Pinyon Script font was created by Nicole Fally and is licensed under the Open Font License
*/

.stuffdiv {
    color: #f8f8f8;
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, #21252E,#2F333C) padding-box, linear-gradient(124deg, #ff2400, #e81d1d, #e8b71d, #e3e81d, #1de840, #1ddde8, #2b1de8, #dd00f3, #dd00f3) border-box;
    padding: 4px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 10px solid transparent;
}

[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
.justify {
   text-align: justify;
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 768px) {
 .justify {
  text-align: left;
 }
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[size 100%]]by ##gray|psychicprogrammer## & ##gray|TheBoxOfFun##[[/size]]
[[/>]]

Just heard a big explosion from up north. Does anyone know what happened?

Our satellites above Asia are currently offline. We are trying to solve this problem as soon as possible.

Il governo italiano sostiene che l'incidente della Corea del Nord sia una "distrazione" dalla crisi dei rifugiati siriani (1/2)
@@@@
----
##grey|Translated from Italian to English ## 
The Italian Government claims that the North Korea Incident is a "distraction" from the Syrian refugee crisis (1/2)[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] Corriere della Sera##grey| @Corriere ¬∑ Apr 6##[[/size]]
----
Il Ministro degli Interni ha dichiarato: "Siamo molto dispiaciuti per la Corea del Nord, ma cosa volete che facciamo, disesplodere il paese?" (2/2)
@@@@
----
##grey|Translated from Italian to English ## 
The Minister of Interior stated, "We are very sorry for North Korea, but what do you want us to do, unexplode the country?" (2/2)[[/div]]

++ California
+++ 10:42 AM
[[/=]]

[[=]]
//"Hey Jack, sweetheart, are you okay?"//
[[/=]]

Jack blinked. His eyes were dry. He was suddenly very aware he needed a glass of water. "Yeah. Just, you know‚Ä¶ Twitter," he said. "Have you heard about the Squirrels?"

Barbara was smiling weakly at him, eyes full of concern.
"You gotta stop reading those things, babe."

In the other room, the kids were making a racket. "I got you!" screamed Will, gleefully.

Jack sat down next to Barbara and took her hand. "Yeah," he said. "It's just..."

He turned his face away, to stare at the wall. "I'm worried about the kids," he said.

Barbara squeezed his hand. "I know, honey," she said. "I don't want them to ever meet some... I don't know, demon, who might kidnap them. Or what if they decide to learn some kind of dark magic? Maybe we should be keeping them off YouTube. Or at least keeping more of an eye on what they watch."

"[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/psa-cognitohazards-and-you|At least we don't have to teach them to Duck and Cover]]]," he said.

She pulled him into a hug. "You're right," she said. She gave him a gentle kiss, on the lips, and smiled.

She reached out her hand to stroke Jack on the cheek and leaned in, conspiratorially. "Hey, if the kids are busy, do you‚Äî"

Will and Sabrina burst in, a tangle of limbs and excited babble. "Mum! Dad! Play Space Cowboys & Psions with us!"

Jack and Barbara both winced, but not so the kids could see, and then turned around with big grins.

"Let's do this!" said Jack, springing up from the bed.

"Yay! You can be the Sheriff of the Space Cowboys!" exclaimed Will.

"And I'll be the Queen of the Psions!" replied Barbara in turn, as dramatically as she could.

Jack and Barbara, the new Sheriff and Queen, held their hands as they headed toward the living room, with the kids running ahead. They held their toy laser guns aloft, ready to face with bravery the uncertain future ahead of them, with the knowledge that, all they could do was to live the present as best they could.

[[=]]
------
------

++ [[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5148|Site-19]]], Undisclosed Location
+++ 11:50 AM
[[/=]]

"‚Äîand now, we have to decide on how to make the new commercials for the European Branches, to improve their public image. The PR Team at Site-34 of the Spanish Branch is making sure that‚Äî"

The new Department of Public Relations was abuzz with activity. Junior Researcher Tommy Adams walked past the conference rooms, listening in as he scrolled his news feed on his phone.

"‚Äîfeedback from social is showing a lot of anti-Foundation sentiment in the 15-30 year old demographic. The new campaign will be targeted through YouTube and social actions in Third World countries. In addition, we could start a Twitter hashtag challenge called '//SCP4u//', in which‚Äî"

//"[[[*broken-masquerade-hub|We're really fucked]]],"// thought Tommy, as he walked away down the hall.
